LanguageData.MuIn.MusicSpot.Active: Active: colonists will play music here.
LanguageData.MuIn.MusicSpot.Inactive: Inactive: colonists will not play music here.
LanguageData.MuIn.AllowRec.Active: Recreation allowed: colonists can play this instrument for any reason.
LanguageData.MuIn.AllowRec.Inactive: Recreation disallowed: colonists can only play this instrument when performing.
